TopicTitle: Introducing the S.S. Your Just Not That Important To Us

Articles.Content:
We can save him! We have the technology... but only if it costs less than 4k... before recovery.

Craft is technically stock but used NEAR and RealChute. Had just enough fuel to get home so I doubt it would work in stock (maybe if your kerbal was in a really low orbit).
